info.name: AMLApp
info.description: Import products massively from Amazon and export them to Mercado Libre through this API.

item.name: Mercado Libre API
Authentication

request.description: Post server-side grant code from authenticated user to get the access token and refresh token.
User must authenticate to grant permissions to our app. It returns a 'Authorization Code Grant Type (Server Side)'
Access /authorization using the APP_ID

Use refresh token from previous authorization

Example response
{
    "access_token": "APP_USR-5575075654822996-021917-8fb9426f06e0e6fd1f39fabd86d0ef99-716746448",
    "token_type": "bearer",
    "expires_in": 21600,
    "scope": "offline_access read write",
    "user_id": 716746448,
    "refresh_token": "TG-602d4c82a5a4ad0006093b60-716746448"
}

item.description: Authenticate user and grant permission to our app. Receive a token.

item.name: Test users

request.description:
{
    "id": 722134977,
    "nickname": "TETE5286671",
    "password": "qatest2041",
    "site_status": "active",
    "email": "test_user_46901087@testuser.com"
}

item.description:
Use access token to generate test users.

Get something like:
{
	"id":120506781,
    "nickname":"TEST0548",
    "password":"qatest328",
    "site_status":"active"
}

item.name: Manage users

request.description: "If you are logged in Mercado Libre and have a token, you will be able to make the call below and learn about your user-related information"

item.description: Simulate interactions between buyers and sellers.
